TextView.android:text:
In this game, you will need to save the world by controlling the SuperBee.\n
SuperBee needs your power in order to fly in the sky. By simply tapping on the screen and SuperBee will gain the power to fly higher.
But there are always villains in the superhero movie, you have to dodge the suicide attacks from the falling spiders.
And in the meanwhile, you have to keep an eye on the tall building, preventing crash on it.
